page.title: 08FAMILY LIFE CHEADLE.
page.content: A TYPICAL WEEKEND FOR THE BENNETT FAMILY. I WOULD STAY IN BED UNTIL 10 AM THEN I GET UP. DAD HAS USUALLY GONE TO WORK SO I HAVE BREAKFAST AND HELP MOTHER AND SOMETIMES DO HOMEWORK. MY UNCLE TAKES MY SISTER AND I TO THE LIBRARY AND OFTEN WE GO TO GRANS FOR A WHILE. IF DAD COMES HOME FOR DINNER THERE IS A HOPE OF AN OUTING IN THE AFTERNOON BUT HE HAS BEEN BUSY LATELY AND THE WEATHER HASN'T BEEN GOOD. IN WINTER WE ENJOY CARD GAMES AND MONOPOLY, ALSO I AM LEARNING CHESS. I LIKE IT WHEN GRAN AND GRANDPA COME FOR TEA. WE HAVE LOTS OF FUN. THEN I SERENADE THEM HOME WITH A TUNE ON THE VIOLIN. IF THE WEATHER IS FINE IN THE SUMMER I AM OUTDOORS, CLIMBING IN WILD BOAR CLOUGH OR VISITING SOME BEAUTY SPOT AND OF COURSE ENJOYING A BARBEQUE ALSO.
